You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ X X X ▢
X ▢ X ▢ X
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
▢ X X X ▢

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square with alternating patterns. The first and last rows have blank spaces in the first and last columns, with X's in the three middle columns. The second and fourth rows have X's in the first, third, and fifth columns, with blank spaces in the second and fourth columns. The middle row has X's in the second, third, and fourth columns, with blank spaces in the first and last columns.
continue

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix. The first row has a blank square, followed by three X's, ending with a blank square. The second row alternates starting with an X, then a blank square, and so on. The third row has an X, followed by a blank square, then three X's. The fourth row is a mirror of the second row, alternating starting with an X. The fifth row mirrors the first row, with a blank square, followed by three X's, and ending with a blank square.
